document_data.caption: A map showing the Three Pearls Nightclub on Pearl Alley.
document_data.name: Three Pearls Nightclub
document_data.mainbody: The '''Three Pearls Nightclub''' was a [[festhall]] and nightclub located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The building was a single story tall.
document_data.Location: The Three Pearls Nightclub was located in the eastern section of the [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]] on [[Pearl Alley]] just east of [[Snail Street]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Volo 5308a}}
